text: Nanuqsaurus ('meaning polar bear lizard') is a genus of theropod dinosaur.Fiorillo A.R & Tykoski R.S. 2014. A diminutive new tyrannosaur from the top of the world. PLOS One. It is only known from one specimen, DMNH 21461, a partial skull roof found in Alaska. This dinosaur may grown to about 6 m (~20 ft) long, half the size of Tyrannosaurus. The skull would have been about 50 cm (1.65 ft) when complete. == References == Category:Tyrannosaurids
title: Nanuqsaurus
